    • 方法详细资料

      • getErrorCode

        public int getErrorCode()
        get error code
        返回:
        error code

      • startStitchTask

        public void startStitchTask()
        Start to specify splicing tasks. Only one splicing task can be executed at the same time. If other tasks are being executed, the status of the specified task is STITCH_STATE_WAIT, otherwise the status of the specified task is STITCH_STATE_START.

      • pauseStitchTask

        public void pauseStitchTask()
        Pause the specified splicing task to make its status as STITCH_ STATE_ PAUSING.

      • deleteStitchTask

        public void deleteStitchTask()
        Delete a task from the task queue.

      • topStitchTask

        public void topStitchTask()
        Topping a splicing task.

      • getFile

        public java.io.File getFile()

      • getOutputJpgFile

        public StitchingUtil.StitchState getStitchState()

      • getProgress

        public float getProgress()
